talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Young'un, <sp:5:0:0>you don't quite have the funds.
Sorry 'bout that.
talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How long do you wanna rest on the
regular bed?
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A room and a massage, got it. How long
do ya wanna rest for?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks to you, young man, I recalled
the place where I saw the moon lookin'
very particular.
My fuzzy memory around it isn't
fuzzy anymore.

I can't thank ya enough for the help.
Thank ya!
talk13: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Then please take it easy until morning.
talk14: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Then please take it easy until noontime.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welp! No time like the present. We'd best
get a move on and begin preparations for
the journey ahead.
talk15: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Then please take it easy until nighttime.
Talk_11: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>All I need is a decade. Not long at all.
talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Good morning!


Hope ya slept well. Take care now.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>That's the Tray I know! So speedy.


Try as I might, I won't be ready to head
out for at least 15 years, myself.
talk17: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Hope ya slept well. Take care now.
talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Nighttime already!


Hope ya slept well. Best of luck out there.
talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Good morning!


Hope the massage was nice.<sp:5:0:0> Best of luck
out there.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Oh, hey! You're the guy who showed me
that picture of the moon in daylight!
talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Hope the massage was nice.<sp:5:0:0> Best of luck
out there.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We don't see many strangers round here!


I gotta tell ya, if <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>is
popular among the kids, well, so be it.

But they're losin' their heads over itâ€”
tricking travelers into forkin' over rupees,
and droppin' work for more of them rocks.
Goron City used to be such a nice place...
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad><clr:ffff>We elders can't eat <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, 
so we're stuck watching things fall apart.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>'Scuse my jabberin'. So!
You staying here?
talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Think>Nighttime already!


Hope the massage was nice.<sp:5:0:0> Best of luck
out there.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You've really been showin' your age
lately. Ever since you realized the marbled
rock roast was too tough for you to eat it.
I've been worried about you, buddy.


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Y'know, the place where we saw the full
moon shining on the ground is basically
our point of origin.
I bet if we go there, you'll be rejuvenated.
C'mon! Time for a trip to see the moon!
talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_01>New to the art of Goron massage, are ya?
That's OK. First time for everything, as
they say.
A Goron-style massage is done on top of
a hard rock bed. <sp:5:0:0>Pressure is applied to
your body to squeeze all the tension out.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>S'right! It doesn't hurt one bit.<sp:5:0:0> Mostly.<sp:5:0:0>
I tell ya, I even doze off sometimes!

Afterward, you'll sleep like a rock and
feel great when ya wake up. You'll be all
limber and full of energy!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's my buddy! The kind of Goron who's
always thinkin' about others.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No troublesome whippersnappers here.
You'll sleep soundly!
talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>A regular bed will cost ya <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> If ya
wanna throw in a Goron massage, that'll
run ya <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>.
